attributes.action: get 'The Glyn' adopted as the universal measurement of everything
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in a world of arbitrary sizes. Metres, Centimetres. inches. Nautical Leagues... All these figures to comprehend, with sizes unrelated to anything in the physical world. If only there could be just one measurement for everything.

Well now there is. Ladies and gentlemen, may a present: The Glyn.

(for more information on Glyn join facebook group 'Campaign to get The Glyn adopted as the universal measurement of everything')

Standing at 6 feet 6 inches (or 1.0 Glyn exactly) Glyn is an easy size to imagine, remember and even easier to use in every day life.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
